projects.description: Point of Service that allows calculate about it inventory according from sales. This version was made exclusively to Pan D' Monium a vegeterian fast food restaurant that make their inventory every day by hand. We wanted it to help them with an intelligent inventory. This progressive web app can work without internet conection and has an authenthification from Firebase. I was in charge in planning, merge branches in commits in Github, in develop,  and implementation negotiation.

Web app that offers transportation service to students. In this project I only focused in layout and google geolocation implementation that can detect location of costumer. Also, the web app is responsive.

Web app that helps you to order, filter and check every Rick and Morty character. Gives you statistics information about the series and offers you well managed data. I was in charge of development and of unit testing.
